评论概述: Good looking, lightweight Wayfarer replica shades
类型: Color: Matte Black Frame Grey LensLens Color: Hot Sale丨Grey
评论详情: I look damn good in Ray Ban Wayfarers and I’ve owned several pairs over the past 40 years. Problem is that the real thing sits too heavily on the bridge of my nose and usually fits uncomfortably otherwise. I am really happy with these Sunier “Retro Classics”. I’ve worn them out three times so far for about 30 minutes each time. They are VERY comfortable. Although they sit on the bridge of my nose, they are so lightweight I can barely feel them. They do not touch my cheeks at all. And they look every bit as good as the originals.  A month ago I coughed up $200 for Liteforce Wayfarers, Ray Ban’s “ultra-light” version of this design. These $14 Suniers are even lighter and more comfortable so I returned the Ray Bans and will be sticking with these. I realize the Suniers are probably not as sturdy and that I’ll have to always remember use the nice protective case they came with. But if they break…so what? I’ll just get another pair.
